root: ^This looks really stable! Gotta pat myself on the back for this one.
^I used to balance on top of the railing all the time. It was one of those things all kids do, y’know?
^When I first started doing it, grandma Hilda was so worried I’d fall and hurt myself.
^But she soon realized that all she had to do was bribe me with some of her raspberry pie and I’d come down.
^I miss those simple days of being allowed to just be a kid.
